Main.welcome: Welcome to the ultimate Star Trek character search!

Results.p: Here you can see all the items found for your query.

About.title: About the Application
About.desc: This React application allows users to search for Star Trek characters using the STAPI (Star Trek API). Results are paginated, and you can explore character details in a split-screen layout.

features.search: Search characters by name (case-insensitive substring match)
features.pagination: Pagination with current page navigation and display
features.masterDetail: Master-detail view: click on a character to view details in a side section
features.urlSync: URL state sync: reflects the current page and selected character in the URL
features.loading: Loading indicator and error fallback UI during fetch operations
features.aboutPage: About page with author information and a link to the RS School React Course

About.author: Stanislav Tsibulskii (Quoralis)
